step1.title: Start
step1.text: Welcome to FrontBase! Since this is your first visit, let's get a few things set-up.

step2.title: Administrator
step2.text: We need a global administrator. This is the person that manages the system and has the highest permissions. They can create other users later.

step3.title: Settings
